item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: <p>Thanks, Matt. Sounds like a good time was had - I'll try to make the next one!<br/><br /></p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Matt. Sounds like a good time was had – I’ll try to make the next one!

item.title: By: Bruce Elgort
item.dc:creator: Bruce Elgort
item.description: <p>Be sure and take some memorable photos. Have Mr. Poole buy you a beer for me <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Be sure and take some memorable photos. Have Mr. Poole buy you a beer for me http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Sorry to hear that Philip, we'll have a drink for you.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Sorry to hear that Philip, we’ll have a drink for you.

Matt

item.title: By: Philip Storry
item.dc:creator: Philip Storry
item.description: <p>I'm afraid I'm not going to make this one, as I have a family funeral to go to.<br/><br /><br/><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif"</a> /><br/><br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
